job.title: Software Engineer
job.description:
******NO C2C/3RD PARTY, LOOKING FOR W2 CANDIDATES ONLY, must be able to work in the US without sponsorship now or in the future***


Job Title: Software Engineer

Location: Burlingame, CA (Remote)

Duration: 6-12 Months


Summary:

Looking for software engineers to contribute towards adopting our libraries, build systems, and dependencies on a new (non-posix) operating system. Software engineers will work alongside our computer vision staff, using multiple repositories to fix build systems and dependencies to bring up a Computer Vision stack (SLAM).


Job Responsibilities:

• Integrate computer vision libraries to a new OS and identify and fix missing dependencies.

• Back propagate all changes in libraries to the main repository.

• Regularly report job progress to team management.


Skills:

• Expertise in C++

• Design of portable libraries for Linux and Android.

• Strong knowledge of build systems.

• Knowledge of version control.

• Experience configuring, building, and testing libraries for Linux and Android.
